message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a new task called iVQA, which involves generating a question given an image and answer pair. This task falls under the intersection of computer vision and natural language processing, which are covered by the sub-categories cs.CV and cs.CL respectively. The paper also proposes a model that uses dynamic inference and attention mechanisms, which are common techniques in machine learning and artificial intelligence, covered by the sub-categories cs.AI and cs.LG. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed model using linguistic metrics and a new ranking metric, which are related to information retrieval and natural language processing, covered by the sub-category cs.IR.
